alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 1:03PM PST until December 27 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 10 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and high winds expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 80 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 10 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
